comment.author: 40779816@N06
comment._content: Remodeled Mountaineer Train on Display at Middletown,NY   May 1938.

comment.author: 64324639@N06
comment._content:
This is  an Orthochromatic B&W image.  It is absolutely impossible to deduce what areas where painted maroon and what were black from this image.  For years these have been misinterpreted in models, paintings etc. as a result. even to this day.  There are a a mere handful of 35mm Kodachrome's and a short 8mm Kodachrome segment of home movies of the Mountaineer and the 405 in private collections.

it is actually quite striking!
